Description.Text: Senator Business Hotel is a friendly 4-star property offering modern accommodation in the heart of Ekaterinburg. Highlights include a restaurant-bar and free Wi-Fi. Ekaterinburg city centre is a vibrant district situated besides the Iset River and steeped in fascinating history. Nearby places of interest include City Hall, the Opera & Ballet House and the Cathedral-on-the-Blood, the site of the former Ipatiev House where the Romanov royal family spent their last months. Ploshchad' 1905 goda metro station provides fast and easy access to other popular Ekaterinburg destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building. Facilities include a recreation room. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 20sqm and decorated in a modern style with tasteful colours and dark wood furniture. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite/cable TV, mini-bar and air-conditioning. The en-suite bathroom features a bathtub with integrated shower. The stylish restaurant offers an a-la-carte menu of international dishes. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Guests can enjoy live music, games and a range of drinks at the hotel bar. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Free parking is possible onsite.
